resources.string: Allow MIUI widgets to be displayed in classic widgets
The distance between the icon and the app name
Close the folder when opening the app
Additional settings for the MIUI launcher
Hide an icon from the launcher
The size of the thumbnail in the recent menu by horizontal

Please activate this module in the LSPosed Manager and restart the MIUI launcher once.\nThe module settings are in the settings of the Home screen!\nSpecific location: Settings - Home screen - Where the \"Default launcher\" used to be.

Diagnostics:
1.This module currently only support LSPosed 5606 or above, it does not going to support any other Xposed frameworks at present.

2.If you have problem with module activate, follow the opinions below: re-optimize MIUI launcher - disable this module - enable this module - force stop MIUI launcher.

3.When some options are invalid, please check whether the MIUI launcher you installed is the latest ALPHA version. If so, please try to re-optimize MIUI launcher in LSPosed and restart it.

4.The final effect depends on your SoC, MIUI version, launcher version and so on. Please refer to the actual performance.
The entered value will be divided by
Please enter a value within the acceptable range!
The launcher will reboot in 2 seconds!
